duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide SAP EWM consulting services with a focus on 3PL (Third Party Logistics) operations.
Collaborate with client teams to design and implement SAP EWM solutions that enhance logistics and supply chain processes.
Conduct system analysis, configuration, and testing to ensure the successful integration of SAP EWM into 3PL operations.
Provide guidance and training to client teams on the use of SAP EWM functionality and best practices.
Support the optimization of warehouse management processes, including inventory control and order fulfillment, within the 3PL environment.
Contribute to the continuous improvement of SAP EWM functionalities and processes, based on industry best practices and client feedback.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to drive the successful implementation and deployment of SAP EWM solutions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field (SAP certification preferred)
